description: This course introduces you the Basic Accounting Concepts from scratch without the use of any confusing jargons whatsoever. It starts off with a simple transaction and its corresponding primary accounting entry. The course then moves on to sections showing the way the transactions are recorded in further accounting statements up to the Final Statement.This module is meant to give the first round exposure to Accounts and would be followed up with later course modules to introduce the intricacies of Accounts absolutely required for any person in a simple innovative manner.
title: Accounting Concepts for Non Finance Professionals - Level 1
